reviews.review:
Esse jogo meche com a sua cabeça, tanto pelos puzzles quanto pela historia. Jogabilidade incrivelmente facil e dinamica, alem do mais, tem um excelente multiplayer co-op.
Portal 2 tem tudo que um jogo precisa para ser bom.
I was a little robot. It was pretty swish. Puzzles are so easy, a baby could solve them. I was also a fat orphan.

This game is Funny, Fun, Cool, Hard, and Confusing. It is very Challenging game, i would reccomend this- giving it a 9/10 it has a Great amount of people that make good Workshop items (Including me) and has lots of DLC/Mods to play with. GLADOS and WHEATLY are one of the best parts, they always have funny jokes for you to hear and Cool test Chambers to give you. This game can get hard- but after you get used to it, it really becomes easy.
This is such a great game... I would recomend it to anyone who likes puzzles and humerous story charaters......

GREAT GAME! 

BUT VALVE NEEDS TO MAKE A 3RD GAME AND HALF LIFE 3!!!!!!!!


10/10 STILL GOOD

Só a trilha sonora já valeria o jogo todo. Só a forma como o enredo foi elaborado muito bem vinculado ao Portal 1 já valeria o jogo todo. Só a Glados já valeria o jogo todo. Mas, o jogo todo vale pelo jogo todo.
1 of the best games ever if you don't like it you have a problem and should leave :D

Puzzles, plataformas, retos, grandes personajes y una aventura muy divertida y desafiante. Muy adictivo, tras superar cada sala de pruebas, resulta muy difícil resistirse a la tentación de jugar una más. 
No vuelven a pecar en la duración, es bastante más largo que ''Portal'' y tiene el añadido del cooperativo.
100% recomendado
Good game

+ Супер захватывающий сюжет

+ Головоломка которая заставляет думать быстрее и чаще
+ Неплохая графика и физика окрущающе среды
+ Рекомендую ее всем кому нравится думать головой в игре.

still amazing

One of the best games ever made, and thanks to the Perpetual Testing Initiative, outstanding value for the price. Not that it wasn't anyway. And it's even on sale at the moment (as of this review, 30th November 2014). Buy it.
Imo the best puzzle game ever. If you like this type of games you will love it

If you like and want wanish your brain sometimes from daily routine, than try this game, but first you should complete original Portal game to follow story line in this one ;-)

The first game I ever bought on Steam.

It's still an amazing game.... Awaiting Portal 3.

There is more then a great single player story here. There is a multiplayer mode with even harder puzzles, more easter eggs than easter time, and funny bonus trailers for the game, and the story is STILL the best part of the game.
I have logged HUNDREDS of hours on games, and this may have been the best one to date.
Great plot twist, great ending, hard at times, and really fun

Puzzles puzzle me. Lots of puzzles, lots of thinking, and lots of fun. Also Co-op with friends 10/10. Great job Valve.

Portal 2 is probably on my top 10 games of all time. Fun story, great level design, fun co-op, good maps and mods and just an overall fun community. Highly recommend it despite being fairly old now.
In co-op, you can high five while making a EEEUUUHHHHG noise. 8/8 m8 no h8, its gr8.

Einfach nur der Hammer.

Excellent game. Love the gameplay. Honestly, this particular game makes one think about the progress of in-home gaming systems in twenty years. For some fun puzzles, excellent comedy, brilliant gameplay, and outstanding graphics, try Portal 2!

I was smart and paid $20 for it. You be smarter and buy it on sale, like it is now.

A very fun game that almost never gets old. Even after you finish the main story, you have cooperative, and the never tiring level editor to play custom cooperative and singleplayer maps! I give it a 10/10!

The longer length as compared to the first game makes the game more enjoyable, and the characters are quirky and neat to encounter, not to mention the online and local Co-Op is a blast.
9 / 10
bom bagarai
Absurdamente bom!

Gud sequel to Portal, with a dingus & cynical bish for comic-relief. Added multi-player & hats to play with friends. Also user-made levels that let you try your hand at making one.

Pros:
+comic relief
+good replayability
+consice in-game tutorial
+ sciency names
+good user-created levels

Cons:
-may-mays made from it
-user-created levels that are over-complicated/ untested/ are glitchable
-still no cake

Afternote: really fun, but slightly over-rated. Could have used cake

~Mail
Игра с довольно неплохим сюжетом. Интересна, заставляет игрока подумать. Хороший мультиплеер, в котором можно найти новых друзей или играть со старыми и "улучшать" командную работу.
Highly recommended for everyone.
Assolutamente nella mia top 3 di giochi preferiti. Chiamarlo semplicemente "Capolavoro" è dire poco, lo consiglio a tutti! Quasi infinito grazie alle migliaia di mappe create dalla comunità :)
Besser und vielfältiger als der Vorgänger der Reihe. Sehr zu empfehlen für zwischendurch!

Игра по истине интересная. Если не считать что [spoiler]50% игры обучение[/spoiler], после повторяющихся камер с испытаниями,которые нам даёт мастер сарказма или просто робот- которого в прошлой части игры завалила героиня, и "случайным"образом которого оживил наш голубогалзый робот друг.Начинается великопный сюжет со сплочёной командой, умственной смекалкой и [spoiler]ПРЕДАТЕЛЬСТВОМ[/spoiler].Дальше нам придётся думать только своей головой используя в руках телепортирующую пушку.Конечно некоторые камеры игры этак так и потреплят нервы своей мудрённостью, но так приятен  вкус очередной победы..Так если игра начнёт наскучать, можно обробовать её и в коперативном режиме со своими братишками.. В ЦЕЛОМ 8 ИЗ 10.
Amazing game.
It is a very nice and unique game. Visually awesome, the game mechanic is just amazing, Portal2 is one of the best mod category game i have played so far.

A more story based approach to the series, with backstory, more puzzles, and everyone's favorite frenemy, Wheatley.

A deserving sequel to an almost perfect game.

Astonishing game. Such story, such drama, such humor, such everything.
I like ham and cheese sandwitches on white bread.

Portal 2 is the perfect followup to the original Portal, with added game mechanics and more mind bending test chambers. As usual, Valve provides excellent voice acting on the part of all characters, and this really brings the player into the experience. The style of the game changes somewhat, with a newer, cleaner graphical appearance, and yet retains it's familiar feel to players of the first game. Portal 2 has an excellent plot, and overall great gameplay. Highly recommended to anyone who wants a serious challenge.

It's been a long time.
Después del éxito que fue Portal con la introducción de los portales a los puzzles llega Portal 2 con la una jugabilidad más pulida y una trama un poco más extensa.
Aunque se pierden algunas mecánicas respecto a la anterior entega, se agregan muchas nuevas que hacen más divertida la experiencia. Además no podemos olvidar a la magnífica GladOS que siempre sabe como usar su sarcasmo contra nosotros.
También tenemos una historia cooperativa que es una muestra más de que en Valve si saben como hacer las cosas.

Por otro lado tenemos el editor de niveles y las camaras creados por la comunidad con soporte de Steam Workshop que le dan mas horas de vida al juego.

Единственая головоломка которю я пройду.

Графика 10\9

сюжет 10\8

ГЕМПЛЕЙ 10\10

ЗВУК 10\10

А ешё тут много шуток и смешных и не очень.
Este fine! Suuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuper fine!!!!!
Great puzzle game. Great dialogue. GREAT EVERYTHING!

I really love this game. It has a way bigger atmosphere than its predecessor, Portal. It also has vast plot points, storyline, and the way I get to walk freely feels like I'm actually inside Aperture Science -- not just inside a game. It's an overall good game and I recommend everyone should buy it.

Jogo seriamente muito legal,história incrível,e muito tempo de raciocínio para passar de todas fases.Ainda tem o Co-op MUITO divertido se você tiver um amigo para jogar,workshop para criar suas próprias test chambers ou para baixar outras test chambers e jogar,sozinho ou com um amigo.Recomendo completamente !!

-IGN too many robots

18/20

HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH-
ALORS LA, je m'etais pris une claque pour le 1, je m'en suis pris une deuxieme pour le 2!
Le 1 se finissait assez rapidement, ce qui m'avait déçu. MAIS ALORS LA, la durée de vie est un peu plus longue (5h environ??) mais très intense! renversement de situation, on en apprend + sur les origines d'Aperture Sciences, nouveaux elements de jeu (gros kiff pour les gels), bref: je dis oui.

Graphisme: réalisme et jeu de lumière encore plus magnifique que le 1, bravo les concepts artists. (la lumière vous aide beaucoup dans ce jeu, ouvrez l'oeil!)
Gameplay: n'a pas changé par rapport au 1 (je crois que la hauteur du saut normal a augmenté???)
Scénario: Vous allez vous poiller, entre une GlaDOS cynique, un Wheatley totalement barré et un Carl Johnson mégaloman.
Musique: tout choupi tout plein, grand coup de coeur aux elements de jeu, qui ont leurs propres musique.
Best humor ever and awesome gameplay
꿀잼

Brilliant. Simply Brilliant. Best game I have ever played. Fantastic storyline, quirky characters, and unusual mechanics, Portal and Portal 2 will keep you entertained for hours. Recommended for all ages.
